title: Stasja Speaking at the Rhino Dev Meeting in Stockholm
description: Stasja has been invited to present the developments of Lux, our very first tool for automated daylight analysis.

title: upskiller Secures Smart Built Environment Grant for Graph-ML Carbon Management Solution
description: We have been awarded funding through Smart Built Environment's Innovationsidén 8 program to develop Graphs4CO₂, an Graph Machine Learning-powered platform technology to integrates carbon data with BIM models.

title: Selected for Scaleway Growth Stage Startup Program
description: The Scaleway Growth Stage Startup Program supports high-potential startups with access to Scaleway's cloud infrastructure, technical resources, and a community to help accelerate growth.

title: Belysningsstiftelsen Grant Awarded
description: upskiller has been awarded funding from Belysningsstiftelsen to develop a machine learning daylight analysis tool that integrates with BIM software for real-time predictions.
